issue.title: Move ByteArrayReadableSeekableByteChannel to vector.util package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-615](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-615). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ByteArrayReadableSeekableByteChannel is useful when reading an ArrowRecordBatch from a byte array with ArrowReader.  Currently it is vector.file test package, this is proposing to move to src/main/java/o.a.a.vector.util
